option.helptext: Enable/disable skill training. If disabled, training points will no longer be earned and skills will not automatically unlock, but otherwise the mod will function as normal. For example, unlearning skills and manually modifying training points through the main menu (wish for {{W|SkillTraining}}) will remain available.

What training rates to use when training skills.
* {{W|Built-in}} (default): Built-in default rates (see {{C|README.md}} for details). * {{W|Adjusted}}: Increase or decrease all training rates by a percentage. * {{W|Customized}}: Adjust the training rate for each skill individually.

Apply this % of the built-in training rate.
Default: {{W|100}}%; same as using {{W|Built-in}} rate.

Percentage of a training point awarded each time {{Y|Cooking and Gathering}} skill is trained.
Default: {{W|33}} (0.33 points per meal).

Percentage of a training point awarded each time {{Y|Customs and Culture}} skill is trained.
Default: {{W|100}} (1 point per water ritual).

Percentage of a training point awarded each time {{Y|Axe}}, {{Y|Cudgel}}, {{Y|Long Blade}}, or {{Y|Short Blade}} skill is trained. For {{Y|Single Weapon Fighting}} the percentage is halved, and {{Y|Multiweapon Fighting}} it is doubled.
Default: {{W|15}} (0.15 points per hit).

Percentage of a training point awarded each time {{Y|Bow and Rifle}}, {{Y|Heavy Weapon}}, or {{Y|Pistol}} skill is trained.
Default: {{W|25}} (0.25 points per hit).

Percentage of a training point awarded each time {{Y|Shield}} skill is trained.
Default: {{W|50}} (0.5 point per bandage).

Percentage of a training point awarded each time {{Y|Physic}} skill is trained.
Default: {{W|100}} (1 point per bandage).

Percentage of a training point awarded each time {{Y|Snake Oiler}} skill is trained.
Default: {{W|50}} (0.5 points per trade).

Percentage of a training point awarded each time {{Y|Swimming}} skill is trained.
Default: {{W|15}} (0.15 points per swim move).

Percentage of a training point awarded each time {{Y|Tinkering}} skill is trained.
Default: {{W|50}} (0.5 points per successful examination).

Percentage of a training point awarded each time {{Y|Deft Throwing}} skill is trained.
Default: {{W|25}} (0.25 points per hit).

Percentage of a training point awarded each time {{Y|Wayfaring}} skill is trained. Recovering from being lost is equivalent to 5 training events.
Default: {{W|15}} (0.15 points per 300 turns on the world map, 0.75 points for regaining your bearings).
